mapper.select: select rno, pNo, pName, startDate, endDate, pImage, period, remainCnt from ( select row_number() over(order by startDate) as rno, pNo, pName, to_char(startDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate, to_char(endDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate, pImage, to_char(endDate-startdate) ||'박 '|| to_char(endDate-startdate+1) ||'일' as period, to_char(to_number(maxNo)-to_number(nowNo)) as remainCnt from tbl_product where startDate > sysdate ) V1 where rno between #{start} and #{end} order by rno
select count(*) as cnt from tbl_product where pNo=#{pNo}

select pNo, pName, to_char(startDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate, to_char(endDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate, pImage, to_char(endDate-startdate) ||'박 '|| to_char(endDate-startdate+1) ||'일' as period, miniNo, maxNo, nowNo, price from tbl_product where pNo=#{pNo}
mapper.update: update tbl_product set nowNo= to_number(nowNo)+to_number(#{cnumber}) where pNo= #{fk_pNo}
update tbl_product set nowNo= to_number(nowNo)-to_number(#{cnumber}) where pNo= #{fk_pNo}
mapper.select: select ceil(count(*)/#{sizePerPage}) as cnt from tbl_product
